io.goobi.viewer.servlets.rest.iiif.presentation

Class ManifestResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.goobi.viewer.servlets.rest.iiif.presentation.AbstractResource
      • io.goobi.viewer.servlets.rest.iiif.presentation.ManifestResource
  • Deprecated. 
    use iiif presentation calls in RecordResource, RecordSectionResource and RecordPageResource instead

    @Path(value="/iiif/manifests")
 @Deprecated
public class ManifestResource
extends AbstractResource

    ManifestResource class.

    Author:
    Florian Alpers

 @Path(value="/{pi}/manifest")

      • getLayer

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{pi}/layer/{type}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getLayer(@PathParam(value="pi")
                                                                                                                       String pi,
                                                                                                                       @PathParam(value="type")
                                                                                                                       String typeName)
                                                                                                                throws PresentationException,
                                                                                                                       IndexUnreachableException,
                                                                                                                       URISyntaxException,
                                                                                                                       ViewerConfigurationException,
                                                                                                                       DAOException,
                                                                                                                       de.unigoettingen.sub.commons.contentlib.exceptions.ContentNotFoundException,
                                                                                                                       de.unigoettingen.sub.commons.contentlib.exceptions.IllegalRequestException,
                                                                                                                       IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a layer containing all annnotations of the given type for the work with the given pi. The annotations are groupd into annotation lists by page, if they belong to a page. Otherwise they are grouped in a single annotation list
        Parameters:
        pi - The pi of the containing work
        typeName - The name of the AnnotationType for which annotations should be returned
        Returns:
        A IIIF layer
        Throws:
        PresentationException - if any.
        IndexUnreachableException - if any.
        URISyntaxException - if any.
        ViewerConfigurationException - if any.
        DAOException - if any.
        de.unigoettingen.sub.commons.contentlib.exceptions.ContentNotFoundException - if any.
        de.unigoettingen.sub.commons.contentlib.exceptions.IllegalRequestException - if any.
        IOException - if any.
